title: Server Maintenance Alert
text:
This NeLS Galaxy server will be down for maintenance on the 4th of November after 16:30.
We apologize for any inconveniences this causes for our users.

title: NeLS Services Alert
text:
Due to infrastructure maintenance, the NeLS portal and storage will be unavailable
from Friday 17th November at 15:00 to Monday the 20th at 10:00.
